abstract: The company is trying to turn its Disney Fairies business into a franchise on the scale of Princesses, a line that generates $4 billion a year in sales.
snippet: The company is trying to turn its Disney Fairies business into a franchise on the scale of Princesses, a line that generates $4 billion a year in sales.
lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES  Apparently Tinker Bell is not a discretionary expense  at least not yet.

headline.main: Disney Hoping ‘Tinker Bell’ Spreads Fairy Dust on Sales
headline.print_headline: Disney Hoping ‘Tinker Bell’ Spreads Fairy Dust on Sales
